website_summaries.verdict: Bargain price for practical use and design.
pros: We love the durability of this tote
Two handles Functions well for carrying wine and also coffee and juice tumblers

customer_reviews.title: Her name is Sharlene
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wine bottle satchel I have ever owned. I have had several of types of these things, the fancy leather one, the less fancy pleathure... some plastic ones, cloth ones, but this one is the best. It is well insulated, has a very strong handle, solid craftsmenship when it comes to the outer material stitching. I don't know how else to say I love this inanimate object, but I do... her name is Sharlene.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Loomis

customer_reviews.title: It's basic.
customer_reviews.text: This bag did arrive same day for $9. After unfolding it from the flat plastic bag it came in, I found the nylon to be cheap, not heavy duty like a good backpack or quality duffel bag. The bottle dividers inside are thin material and won't cushion your bottles from each other. I guess I should have expected less for $9. It will keep wine bottles from rolling around in the trunk, so I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: BrianT

customer_reviews.title: Condensation leaks through bottom
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the first time with three bottles of wine and a ziplock of ice. Ice was to keep wine cold as well as to be used in the wine if necessary. Discovered big puddle under carrier as the bag of ice began to sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Unlikely to protect bottles or to last
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to Brian T. For $10 I should have expected that this would not be of great quality. The nylon outer material and zipper are cheap, and the interior dividers provide no protection whatsoever. I’ll be lucky to get 2 or 3 uses from this carrier before it breaks. It is even more likely that bottles will break from knocking into each other. I should have spent the additional $ and got a nicer one
customer_reviews.author: TomP

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It comes in so handy going to the spa, and on trips. Only problem we have is sometimes bottles are too tall, and if we cork a bottle it is definitely not tall enough. It definitely protects bottles while carrying it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Perfect in every way! I bought two of these products and use them constantly. They are fully padded and keep wine safe and sound. The handle is sturdy and the case holds 4 bottles. I highly recommend. PS: On other sites these were going for $50.00 so this carrier is an excellent good deal at around $10.00.
customer_reviews.author: bokuno

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wine bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this years ago and I still love it! We use if for not just bringing wine but sometimes 1 wine bottle, 1 liter of soda and then stacked cans and/or food. We have a small studio with no space for a cooler, so we gave this bag a try. We have brought it with us on boat outings and our wine has stayed cool for hours. Sturdy as hell and would totally purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Excellent Item Works As Advertised and Is Truly Being Enjoyed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wine carrier tote bag for a caregiver of mine who has been with me for 14 years! We travel very well together and when traveling she likes to buy wine to bring home so I saw this item and thought it would be very easy and comfortable to transport her wine that she purchased! The items keep the wine very safe sturdy and confined into their own middle cubbyholes! I would recommend this item to anyone who is a wine drinker and travels and wants to bring wine home from all areas of the world!
customer_reviews.author: SAMUEL GOLD

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use it to hold 20oz tumblers of water. I really think these are of good quality. I have the 2 wine holder too. I cut out the middle divider and use it for food for work.
customer_reviews.author: bg

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality at a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for 4-pack wine carriers for easier handling when buying a case. Bought three and works like a charm. The padded insulation protects the bottles while transporting. Quality is very good. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylu

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take wine on a cruise. Very nice to have a carryon for 4 bottles. Good padding on the outside. The dividers though seem very flimsy. Have very expensive wine I hope makes it through ok.
customer_reviews.author: Parkland_C6

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect! Great bag, but the ONLY thing I have issue with is after time the cover on the handle cracks. I would give it less stars But I cut the Cracked cover off and the handle under it is perfectly sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Denise HTop Contributor: Harmonicas

customer_reviews.title: great to take on cruises
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take on a cruise. We brought two bottles of wine, and two sodas on board the ship in this tote. Off the ship, we carried off four bottles of liquor in this tote. Very easy to carry. I feel like if I would have dropped it, the liquor would have been saved because the tote is padded well. Only thing, I wish they would make a long strap to carry on my shoulder, easier to carry other luggage. I would recommend this tote.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend that loves wine and picnics. She loved it. The 4 compartments comfortably fits 4 bottles of wine. The best part she also has the option to perhaps pack one bottle or two and use the other compartments for a sandwich or two and some snacks for a small picnic. Would recommend this to any one.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loved it. Not sure how sturdy it will be long term but it’s lightweight, perhaps will edit after a good bit of Use.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Solid four-carrier
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Solid four-carrier. Good cooling preservation and easy to carry. One flaw is the fabric can tear or rip so heavy use requires you check it from time to time to ensure there's no damage the the fabric. The good news is that a tear or rip is easy to repair :-)

product_meta.title: Wine Carrier Tote Bag - 4 Bottle Pockets - Attractive wine bag with thick external padding, zipper and easy to carry handles. The wine tote bag is perfect for travel, picnics or a day at the beach.
product_meta.description: Size:4 BottlesWhen you want to bring wine along to a friend’s dinner party, the beach, a picnic, outdoor concert, or anywhere else that pairs well with a bottle of red or white, you need to get it there safely. A store bag with those annoying cardboard pieces just won’t do it. But our insulated wine carrier bag is the perfect solution! Four pockets are each roomy enough to fit four standard-size wine bottles upright, and soft dividers keep them from clanging together. The wine tote bag has a durable zipper top that provides a dependable seal so bottles remain secure. Two extra-long handles mean you can carry it easily, especially when you’re bringing along other items like food to go with your wine. Extra thick external padding keeps the wine bottles safe. This attractive wine bag makes it great for use anytime you need to tote wine somewhere else. In fact, buy two wine bags so you can give one to a friend. Just fill it with four bottles of their favorite wines, and you’ll be giving them five gifts in one since they’ll be able to reuse the bag again and again. That’s because the foldable material provides easy storage when your picnic or other event is over. Once you’ve served the wine, just fold it and tuck the reusable wine tote bag back in your picnic basket or beach bag and use it next time.
feature_bullets: Four wine carrier pockets are each roomy enough to fit four standard-size wine bottles upright.
Durable zipper provides dependable closure; two handles make the wine bag easy to carry.
Extra-thick padding secures the wine tote bottles in place keeping them from clanging together.
Attractive wine carrier makes it great for use with travel, picnics, beach days, and more.
Foldable canvas material offers easy storage when not in use as a wine bag and makes a great gift.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars497 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
